value.title: DAX Fridays! #172: LEFT, RIGHT, LEN, SEARCH - Split text by character in DAX
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to split text by a character using DAX and why this search error happens and how to solve it: The search Text provided to function 'SEARCH' could not be found in the given text.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE

value.excerpt: Did you know that you can use a slicer in Power BI to highlight values instead of filtering them? value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX?  This scenario is often called role playing dimensions and in this video I will show you two ways to solve it. :) Happy Friday!!  Links to videos mentioned: Introduction to data modeling:

value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX!  The DIVIDE function performs divisions and returns alternate result or BLANK() on division by 0.It is faster than the simple division operator.  NEXT VIDEO: - PREVIOUS VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SsZseKOgrWQ   Looking for a download file?

value.title: DAX Fridays! #23: ISFILTERED
value.excerpt: In this video we will through the ISFILTERED function in DAX.  This function is useful to detect when a column has been filtered and as shown in this video you can use it to set conditions when a column has been filtered. value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #: 75: SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the DAX function called SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR.  This little function is great for analyzing as the function itself says, the same period last year.  If you have seasonal business and you want to analyze what happended the same period the previous year, it will do it flowless.
